title: Joe Biden Goes Full Fascist Dictator | Daily Best of September 2 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Joe Biden delivers a speech with optics that echoed Mussolini and Palpatine. The Biden administration then labels half the country as "extreme." In sports, "Lou Holtz" joins the show to talk all things college football. Speedy reports on his duties as the stadium hype man for UAB football. And lastly, Kanye West has gone so crazy, Rick actually agrees with Kim Kardashian about something.
